The record of animals on hand had not been updated to reflect recent changes to the inventory. There were recent
dispositions of animals which had not been documented. The inventory must be kept current to accurately reflect the
number of animals on hand at the facility.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representatives.
End Section
